attributes.action: Allow reward points and special offers on first baby milk.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All supermarkets and other shops that give reward points on purchases are not allowed to award points for first baby milk and also are not allowed special offers on them either. We all know the benifits of mothers own milk but mothers should be allowed freedom of choice and not punished for that choice, and it is not always practical or possible for all women to breast feed for medical or other reasons and why should they be punished too.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
